title: Danny Nash from Departures
itunes:title: Danny Nash from Departures
description:
Late one evening Danny Nash, the guitarist for the Scottish hardcore band Departures, and I spoke at length about living in rural Scotland, discovering music and battling cancer. It's a very enlightening chat that ultimately left a deep impression on me, not to mention the band is absolutely incredible. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
